DOC.criteria: BMI : 20 ㎏/㎡ , less 26 ㎏/㎡ Systolic blood pressure : 90 , less 140 ( mmHg ) Diastolic blood pressure : 60 , less 100 ( mmHg ) Evidence clinically significant , severe , active , unstable gastrointestinal , renal , hepatic , respiratory , hematological , endocrine , cardiovascular system disease .
